short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make a call with Sendblue application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Make Calls with SendBlue

Transform your browsing experience with our extension! It automatically detects phone numbers on any webpage, adding a convenient phone icon next to them. With just one click, you can initiate a call via the SendBlue application—no need to copy and paste numbers ever again.

Features:

Instantly identifies and highlights phone numbers on web pages.
Adds a clickable phone icon for seamless calling.
Direct integration with the SendBlue app for quick and easy dialing.
Save time and streamline your workflow—try it now!
